articles.description: The Last of Us Part II is a long game with a lot of ideas--but it turns out that quite a few other aspects of the game were cut before release.
articles.content:
WARNING: this article will SPOIL PLOT DETAILS for The Last of Us Part II. If you don't want the plot spoiled, turn away now.
The Last of Us Part II is out now on PS4, and players are finally able to… [+2087 chars]
